title: Andhra Pradesh govt approves JSW AP Steel's integrated steel plant in Kadapa district
description: The initial phase involves an investment of ₹4,500 crore, followed by a second phase with an investment of ₹16,350 crore.

title: Showroom B2B opens new apparel manufacturing facility in Noida
description: The new facility is part of Showroom B2B’s broader five-year strategy, which includes doubling topline revenue annually and reaching a target of ₹2,500 crore.

title: India’s finished steel imports fall nearly 30% in Q1 FY26: Govt data
description: Imports from China and Japan dropped sharply, while domestic production and consumption continued to rise, keeping India a net steel importer in the first quarter.

title: India must scale up manufacturing sector, establish its own robust supply chain: Dammu Ravi
description: Speaking at a session organised by the Merchants' Chamber of Commerce and Industry (MCCI) here, Ravi said the GDP of the country is growing.

title: India’s industrial output growth slows to 1.5% in June, lowest in 10 months
description: Manufacturing output, which accounts for a significant share of the IIP, rose by 3.9 per cent in June 2025, slightly higher than the 3.5 per cent growth recorded in June 2024.

title: Role of state govts in rare earth explorations is crucial for India's self-sufficiency in this sector: SBI Report
description: The report highlighted that critical minerals, including rare earth elements, are essential to modern production due to their unique physical and chemical properties.

title: India cautious as US deals with Japan, others unravel
description: India would not be bound by timelines when it came to trade negotiations, Minister Piyush Goyal said, signalling that the government won't rush into a deal at the cost of national interest.

title: India Inc’s revenue growth moderates to 4-6% in Q1FY26: CRISIL
description: Ebitda growth was 4%, but margins declined, particularly in IT, auto, FMCG, and pharma. Select sectors like auto, construction, pharma, telecom, and retail contributed to overall growth, showcasing an uneven recovery.

title: Hindustan Zinc expands land reclamation efforts in Rajasthan
description: The initiative, conducted in partnership with The Energy and Resources Institute (TERI), uses Mycorrhiza technology to rehabilitate Jarofix-laden industrial land.

title: Hilti's Vadodara plant becomes first in India to receive DGNB gold certification
description: The DGNB certification assesses buildings throughout their life cycle—covering planning, construction, operation, and decommissioning. The Vadodara plant meets these criteria through features such as energy-efficient systems, water recycling, biodiversity support, and inclusive design.

title: Best Manufacturing Events & Conferences in India You Should Attend.
description: Best Manufacturing Events & Conferences in India: In this evolving scenario, manufacturing events in India serve as powerful platforms to bring together key stakeholders, OEMs, suppliers, policymakers, technology innovators, and investors. Read this & find the best manufacturing events in India, you should attend.

title: Vedanta awards ₹865 crore integrated service contract to AESL
description: Asian Energy Services Ltd. (AESL) has secured a significant integrated service contract worth Rs 865 crore from Vedanta Ltd. This contract, inclusive of GST, will be executed over 57 months.

title: US, EU agree on 15% tariff deal to prevent trade war
description: Donald Trump announced the deal after meeting Ursula von der Leyen. The EU will purchase energy and invest in the US. They will also buy military equipment.

title: South Korea faces risks from US tariff due to reliance on exports,manufacturing
description: It ranked second among OECD member countries, following Ireland at 31 percent. By comparison, Germany recorded 20.1 percent and Japan 20.7 percent.

title: Rajoo Engineers signs non-binding offer to acquire a machine manufacturer
description: The synergy arising from this potential acquisition is expected to strengthen the company's position by offering end-to-end solutions to customers across the value chain, it said.

title: India fails to secure exemption from UK carbon tax in trade agreement: GTRI
description: India's recent trade pact with the UK fell short of securing a carbon tax exemption, raising concerns for its carbon-heavy exports. Starting in 2027, the UK will roll out its Carbon Border Adjustment Mechanism, potentially affecting Indian goods worth up to USD 775 million, particularly in industries like steel, aluminum, and cement.

title: ArcelorMittal Nippon Steel partners with CSIR-CRRI to adopt steel slag road technology
description: Under this new partnership, AM/NS India has been granted a licence to manufacture, market, and sell specially designed processed steel slag aggregates for road construction.

title: Rajnath Singh to lay foundation of railway coach factory in MP's Raisen on Aug 10
description: In a statement on Friday, the Madhya Pradesh government stated that railway coach manufacturing project of worth Rs 1,800 will mark the beginning of a major industrial step in the state.

title: India likely to gain 5% additional market share in UK within 2 yrs
description: On automobiles, India will reduce import duties to 10 per cent over five years, down from the current rate of up to 110 per cent, under a liberalised quota system.

title: Mahindra Logistics leases nearly 3 lakh sq ft industrial space in Pune
description: According to the lease agreement, the monthly rental is ₹24 per sq ft, translating to a total monthly rent of ₹71.37 lakh.
